title: Disney World
name: Disney World
description:
A Map by Gpwieland

A map of Disney World

properties.name: Aloha Isle
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandDole Whips! Get your Dole Whips!

properties.name: America Gardens Theatre
properties.description: Posted by Gpwieland Live performances take place here.

properties.name: American Adventure
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThe American Adventure Pavilion in Epcot\'s World Showcase

properties.name: American Adventure Show
properties.description: Posted by Gpwieland This show combines audio animatronic figures and film to great effect.

properties.name: American Heritage Gallery
properties.description: Posted by Gpwieland This exhibit features patriotic stuff from United States history.

properties.name: Animation Gallery
properties.description: Posted by Gpwieland Collectibles related to animation in this shop.

properties.name: Ariel's Grotto
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandMeet Ariel from Little Mermaid.

properties.name: Astro Orbiter
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is like Dumbo except high in the air. Probably about fifty feet or more in the air.

properties.name: Aunt Polly's Dockside Inn
properties.description: Posted by Gpwieland Cold drinks are available from this stand. Soft serve?

properties.name: Auntie Gravities Galactic Goodies
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandGet Ice cream at this counter.

properties.name: Backlot Tour
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is a tram tour of the studio backlot with one special effects segment.

properties.name: Beach Club
properties.description: Posted by Gpwieland  This is the Beach Club Resort and Beach Club Villas.

properties.name: Beauty and the Beast - Live on Stage
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis stage show features highlights from the popular Disney Movie.

properties.name: Big Thunder Mountain Railroad
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandI love this the most of all coasters at Disney World. It isn\'t the most advanced or thrilling coaster, bbut I think that the extra effort that goes into the ride details make it better than the rest.

properties.name: Bijutsu-Kan Gallery
properties.description: Posted by Gpwieland This rotating exhibit houses items related to Japanese culture.

properties.name: Boardwalk
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is the Boardwalk resort and the Boardwalk Villas.

properties.name: Buzz Lightyear's Space Ranger Spin
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandIn this interactive dark ride you earn points by blasting enemies with a laser gun while spinning your craft around.

properties.name: Canada
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is the Canada Pavilion in Epcot\'s World Showcase.

properties.name: Carousel of Progress
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis ride moves the audience around the central display area. The animatronics are great, but the show is open less frequently than it could be.

properties.name: Casey's Corner
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandSome of the best hot dogs anywhere on earth.

properties.name: Celebrity Five and Ten
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandGet gifts for the home at this store.

properties.name: China
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is the China Pavilion in Epcot\'s World Showcase.

properties.name: Cinderella's Castle
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandCinderella\'s Castle lies at the end of Main Street USA, and at the entrance to Fantasy Land

properties.name: Cinderella's Golden Carrousel
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandA well restored classic carrousel.

properties.name: Cinderella's Royal Table
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandPrincess breakfasts and lunches. The breakfast is especially hard to get. Table service.

properties.name: Circle of Life
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandCharacters from the Lion King look at the relationship between humans and the planet in a motion picture presentation.

properties.name: City Hall
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is the place for guest relations. You can find guidemaps and time schedules here as well.

properties.name: Columbia Harbour House
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandNew England style food at this counter service restaurant.

properties.name: Contemporary Resort Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Gpwieland Though the Contemporary resort was built for the opening od Walt Disney World it is still the most modern in appearance of all the resorts. It has recently been given a revamp to upgrade it\'s quality.

properties.name: Coral Reef Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Gpwieland Dine right next to Aquarium glass in this table service establishment. Seafood is featured.

properties.name: Cosmic Ray's Starlight Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Gpwieland A variety of burgers, bbq, and the like are available at this counter service place.

properties.name: Country Bear Jamboree
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis animatronic show features singing and some corny jokes. Good fun all around.

properties.name: Crystal Palace Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Gpwieland This is a character Buffet with characters from Pooh stories.

properties.name: Disney-MGM Studios Entrance Plaza
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is the entrance to the Disney-MGM Studios.

properties.name: Dock to Frontierland
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandBoard a boat back to Frontierland from here.

properties.name: Dock to Tom Sawyer Island
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandBoard the boat to Tom Sawyer Island here.

properties.name: Dolphin
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is the Dolphin Resort.

properties.name: Donald's Boat
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandA play area for little kids to get wet.

properties.name: Dumbo the Flying Elephant
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandSimple but very popular ride featuring ride in elephants that rotate around a hub and elevate.

properties.name: El PirataY el Perico Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Gpwieland Tacos and such are the fare at this counter service establishment.

properties.name: El Rio del Tiempo
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is a boat ride in the vein of Small World inside the Mexico pavilion.

properties.name: Electric Umbrella
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis counter service place offers American style fast food.

properties.name: Emporium
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandLargest gift shop in Magic Kingdom. Sells all manner of themed gifts.

properties.name: Enchanted Grove
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandFrozen Fruit drinks and coffee.

properties.name: Epcot Entrance Plaza
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandPresent admission medial and enter the park here. Alternately, you can use the International Gateway from Boardwalk or Beach Club.

properties.name: Epcot Monorail Station
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandCatch the monorail here back to the TTC.

properties.name: Fantasmic
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is a thrilling fireworks show with mixed effects from live actors to water effects to make it a great show.

properties.name: Fountain View Espresso and Bakery
properties.description: Posted by Gpwieland This quick service shop has coffee shop items.

properties.name: France
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is the France Pavilion in Epcot\'s World Showcase.

properties.name: Frontierland Shootin' Arcade
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandShoot beams of light at targets for comedic reactions.

properties.name: Frontierland Station
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis a stop on the Walt Disney World Railroad. From here stops are Toontown and Main Street.

properties.name: Galaxy Palace Theater
properties.description: Posted by Gpwieland If there is going to be live entertainment in Tomorrowland, this is where it will be.

properties.name: Garden Grill
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is a table service character dining establishment, featuring Chip \'n\' Dale. The dining room rotates and is open for lunch and dinner.

properties.name: Germany
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is the Germany Pavilion of Epcot\'s World Showcase.

properties.name: Hall of Presidents
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandOne of the best Audio Animatronic shows. Hear Lincoln and the current president speak.

properties.name: Honey I Shrunk the Kids Movieset Adventure
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is a playground where little kids can play that they have been shrunk to the size of ants.

properties.name: Honey, I Shrunk the Audience
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis 3D presentation makes it seem as though the entire auditorium has been shrunk. Hilarity ensues.

properties.name: House of Whispering Willows
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis circular structure has amazing acoustics.

properties.name: Illuminations: Reflections of Earth
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis show features lasers, fire, fireworks, water, and video images each night.

properties.name: ImageWorks - What If Labs
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis area has all sorts of slick interactive gadgets meant to engage the imagination.

properties.name: Imagination! Pavilion
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandExplore the world of the mind in this pavilion.

properties.name: Impressions de France
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis wide angle film shows the beauty of France and is set to good classical music by French composers.

properties.name: Indiana Jones Epic Stunt Spectacular
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandIn addition to showing some Hollywood style stunts, this live show also shows how they are done. There is an opportunity for audience participation.

properties.name: Innoventions East
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandLots of exhibits about coming technology for the home and business.

properties.name: Innoventions West
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandIn addition to the technology exhibits, there is also an area that may house custom arrangements.

properties.name: International Gateway
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is the back door to Epcot.

properties.name: It's a Small World
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandPeople claim to hate this ride and the song, but they would riot if it was removed. A classic, and deservedly so.

properties.name: Italy
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is the Italy Pavilion in Epcot\'s World Showcase.

properties.name: Japan
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is the Japan Pavilion in Epcot\'s World Showcase.

properties.name: Journey into the Imagination with Figment
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandFigment is a little purple dragon that serves as a guide on this ride through of the imagination.

properties.name: Judge's Tent
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandMickey meet and greet.

properties.name: Jungle Cruise
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandEnjoy a tour of the jungle with a wise cracking skipper.

properties.name: Keystone Clothiers
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandFashion and accessories for adults fans.

properties.name: L.A. Cinema Storage
properties.description: Posted by Gpwieland Gifts featuring Mr. Potato Head.

properties.name: Legends of Hollywood
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandGet gifts featuring Winnie the Pooh and related characters in this shop.

properties.name: Liberty Square Riverboat
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThe riverboat is very cool, and old school, but not all that odd to me since we have them here in Sacramento too. Still it\'s a nice touch.

properties.name: Liberty Square Riverboat Dock
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandBoard the paddlewheel boat here for a trip around the Rivers of America.

properties.name: Liberty Tree Tavern
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandA table service restaurant with a selection of American food.

properties.name: Lights Motors Action!
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is a live action stunt show with motor vehicles.

properties.name: Living with the Land
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is a boat ride on which ecology and agricultural techniques are discussed. The greenhouse and hydroponic areas are especially interesting.

properties.name: Mad Tea Party
properties.description: Posted by Gpwieland  Spinning round and round. You might not want to ride this just after eating.

properties.name: Maelstrom
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis boatride takes you among trolls and almost over a waterfall.

properties.name: Magic Kingdom Bag Check
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandHere they will check your bags to make sure you aren\'t bringing dangerous things into the park.

properties.name: Magic Kingdom Bus Stop
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandBoard Busses here to return to your resort hotel.

properties.name: Magic Kingdom Dock
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is where you will board boats to get to area Hotels or the ferry across the lake to get to the TTC

properties.name: Magic Kingdom Entrance Plaza
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandHere you will provide your ticket and enter the park.

properties.name: Magic Kingdom Monorail station
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is where you board the Magic Kingdom loop of the monorail to return to the TTC or to get to Hotels on the loop.

properties.name: Main Street Bakery
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandIntoxicating pastries that seem to draw you to them with scent as you walk by.

properties.name: Main Street Station
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandBoard the Walt Disney World Railroad for a trip around the park. Stops at Frontierland and Micky\'s Toontown Fair.

properties.name: Main Street Vehicles
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandOnly a ride in the very strictist sense, these vehicles add more charm to main street than provide transportation. I wish they would run them a little more frequently than they do, but I think there is a danger of running down some of the thousands of strollers.

properties.name: Mexico
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is the Mexico Pavilion in Epcot\'s World Showcase.

properties.name: Mickey's Country House
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandPop in on Mickey\'s House.

properties.name: Mickey's Philharmagic
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis 3D show is fantastic. Great effects throughout.

properties.name: Mickey's of Hollywood
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is a character merchandise location.

properties.name: Minnie's Country House
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandCheck out Minnie\'s house.

properties.name: Mission: SPACE
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis centrifuge based ride is meant to simulate a launch and trip into space. The experience may be a bit extreme for some, so there is a non-spinning version available.

properties.name: Morocco
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is the Morocco Pavilion in Epcot\'s World Showcase.

properties.name: Mrs. Potts' Cupboard
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandSoft serve ice cream can be found here.

properties.name: Muppet Vision 3D
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis show combines 3D movie effects with a little live action and some animatronics, and hilarity ensues.

properties.name: Norway
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is the Norway Pavilion in Epcot\'s World Showcase.

properties.name: O Canada
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis circle vision movie shows off the splendor of Canada.

properties.name: Partners Statue
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandA statue of Walt Disney and Mickey Mouse.

properties.name: Pecos Bill's Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Gpwieland American Fare in the form of burgers at this counter service spot.

properties.name: Peter Pan's Flight
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis dark ride through has one of the best effects ever in the flight over London at night.

properties.name: Pirates of the Carribean
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis dark boat ride was recently updated to include characters from the movies.

properties.name: Plaza Ice Cream Parlor
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandIce cream cones and sundaes

properties.name: Pooh's Playful Spot
properties.description: Posted by Gpwieland(satellite not correct) This spot used to house the 20,000 leagues under the sea ride, but now is a padded play area for little kids.

properties.name: Reflections of China
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is a circle-vision movie about the beauties that China has to offer.

properties.name: Richard Petty Driving Experience
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandI\'ve never done this, but is seems like a fun, if expensive, thing to add to a vacation. You can ride along or race your own nascar style vehicle.

properties.name: Rock 'n' Roller Coaster
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis ride takes off from a dead stop to screaming fast. Features inverted sections and loud rock music in an indoor venue.

properties.name: Rock Around the Shop
properties.description: Posted by Gpwieland Get gifts related to the Rock \'n\' Roller Coaster ride.

properties.name: Scuttles Landing
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandFrozen Coke can be had here.

properties.name: Sid Cahuenga's One of a Kind
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis little shop has genuine relics from the history of cinema and Hollywood stuff.

properties.name: Sleepy Hollow
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandFunnel Cakes and soft serve.

properties.name: Snow White's Scary Adventures
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandMeet dwarves and a witch on this dark ride.

properties.name: Soarin'
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandFly over California in a hang-glider like ride.

properties.name: Sounds Dangerous
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis show takes place mostly in the dark to help you focus on the sound effects. The result is quite realistic.

properties.name: Space Mountain
properties.description: Posted by Gpwieland28.41948, -81.58115Space Mountain in an enclosed coaseter in Tomorrowland

properties.name: Spaceship Earth
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandI hope that this ride remains much as it is for some time. I love the ability to slowly crawl through this sphere and relax watching the animatronics. I think it is getting less popular though, so they\'ll probably gut it for a new attraction before too long.

properties.name: Splash Mountain
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandIt\'s a shame that they never released Song of the South on DVD, but I was able to see it in the theatre on a rerelease when I was young. It is great, and so s the ride made for it.

properties.name: Star Tours
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis ride combines a moving ride vehicle with film to provide a convincing effect of flying through space with characters from the Star Wars movies.

properties.name: Stave Church Gallery
properties.description: Posted by Gpwieland This gallery has a rotating exhibition relating to Norway.

properties.name: Stitch's Great Escape
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis ride is a little toned down to include Stitch from its days as eXtraTerrorestial, but it is still a little frightening for those with a fear of the dark.

properties.name: Sunset Club Couture
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandCollectible items and men\'s wear and accessories.

properties.name: Sunshine Seasons
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is the food court area for The Land. Far from the ordinary, this food court offers a wide variety of interesting, and frequently healthy, options.

properties.name: Sunshine Tree Terrace
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandI cream and drinks can be had at this counter.

properties.name: Swan
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is the Swan Resort.

properties.name: Swiss Family Treehouse
properties.description: Posted by Gpwieland Disney Tree with all the comforts of home.

properties.name: Test Track
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis ride lets you experience a little of what an automobile testing facility and proving grounds might be like.

properties.name: The Barnstormer
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is a short but well done rollercoaster. It is tame enough for smaller kids, but still fun for silly adults.

properties.name: The Darkroom
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is the shop for camera needs.

properties.name: The Enchanted Tiki Room
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandBirds and Masks sing and entertain.

properties.name: The Great Movie Ride
properties.description: Posted by Gpwieland  This ride features a trip through some famous movie scenes from film history. Also has a little live action parts.

properties.name: The Haunted Mansion
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis ride through has good effects and good humor. The cast members here are the best around.

properties.name: The Land
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis pavilion has to do with conservation and best practices for land management. Doesn\'t sound exciting, but there is fun stuff to be had.

properties.name: The Living Seas
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandIn this exhibit see a huge aquarium, and interact with Crush, the turtle from Finding Nemo.

properties.name: The Lunching Pad
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is one place to get turkey legs.

properties.name: The Magic Carpets of Aladdin
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandLike Dumbo, but with an Aladdin theme. Spitting camel.

properties.name: The Magic of Disney Animation
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is a short tour of the animation process.

properties.name: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandRide through attraction in the storybook of Winnie the Pooh

properties.name: The Pinocchio Village House
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandItalian style fast food.

properties.name: The Plaza Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Gpwieland American style fare at this sit down eatery.

properties.name: The Timekeeper
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandA Robot (voiced by Robin Williams) guides you on a trip through time. May be closed.

properties.name: Tom Sawyer Island
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandI love Tom Sawyer Island, though I am hardly a child. It is just what I always wanted growing up, a place to be wild. It is also good because you can get away from the crowds there.

properties.name: Tomorrowland Arcade
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandPlay arcade games here.

properties.name: Tomorrowland Indy Speedway
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis ride lets little kinds pretend to drive. Loses some charm when you get a real license.

properties.name: Tomorrowland Terrace Noodle Station
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandIf you are in the mood for a popular rice bowl, this is the place to go. Counter service.

properties.name: Tomorrowland Transit Authority
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThe WED way people mover is one of my favorites. its linear induction motors move the little cars on a tour of Tomorrowland.

properties.name: Tony's Town Square Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Gpwieland Italian style fare in this table service spot.

properties.name: Toontown Hall of Fame
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandSeveral character meet and greets. Get ready for the lines.

properties.name: Toontown Station
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is a stop on the Walt Disney World Railroad. Stops from here are Main Street and Frontierland.

properties.name: Tower of Terror Shop
properties.description: Posted by Gpwieland Get gift items related to the Tower of Terror

properties.name: Transportation and Ticket Center
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandTHe Transportation and Ticket center, or TTC, is the place all day visitors to the Magic Kingdom go from the parking lot to catch transport to the park. Monorails can be caught to Magic Kingdom or Epcot, and Ferries go to the Magic Kingdom.

properties.name: Tree of Life
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThe Tree of Life is not a real tree at all, but rather a Disney tree made of steel and concrete. Based on an ofshore drilling platform, the tree is covered with sculptures of animals in its bark. It is around fourteen stories tall.

properties.name: Twilight Zone Tower of Terror
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis ride involves a dropping elevator that is set against the backdrop of a haunted hotel and a Twilight Zone story.

properties.name: United Kingdom
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is the United Kingdom Pavilion in Epcot\'s World Showcase.

properties.name: Universe of Energy
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is a long two part experience. In the first there is a filmed presentation about energy, and in the second the theater breaks up and drives through a diorama of dinosaurs and such.

properties.name: VMK Central
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis area is for players of Disney\'s Virtual Magic Kingdom.

properties.name: Voyage of the Little Mermaid
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is a truly impressive show featuring black lit puppetry with slick lighting effects.

properties.name: Walt Disney, One Man's Dream
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is an exhibit featuring some of the achievements of Walt Disney himself. Features a film in addition to physical items.

properties.name: Yacht Club
properties.description: Posted by GpwielandThis is the Yacht Club resort.
